answers.answer: HI,If your sister has genital herpes, she is not putting your mother in any risk. Herpes is spread through direct physical contact (so if your sister had cold sores on her lip, caused by another type of herpes, it would be the same thing--your Mom should not touch her lip or drink from the same cup during an outbreak).Hope this helps,take care.
